General.Name: ALT Telecom Public Company Limited
General.Description: ALT Telecom Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the manufacture, installation, maintenance, rental, and sale of telecommunication network equipment in Thailand. The company operates through three segments: Network Equipment, Electricity Meter and Solar Cell Distribution Business; Network Equipment Installation Business; and Network Equipment Rental Business. It also manufactures, assembles, installs, and distributes electricity meters; sells, installs, and rents solar cells; leases and manages telecommunication basic structure; sells and distributes telecom shelter and RDU; and constructs base stations. The company was incorporated in 2001 and is headquartered in Bang Kruai, Thailand.
General.Address: 52/1 Moo 5, Bang Kruay-Sai Noi Road, Bang Kruai, Thailand, 11130
